name: South Central Mental Health Counseling Center, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: South Central Mental Health Counseling Center, Inc. is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in El Dorado, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $9.1M in Medicaid payments across 73K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $9.1M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
